channel.title: Incorrect clipping with stool and lab coat
channel.description: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96030488[/url] I can't exactly remember where this happened, it was in Anomalous Materials chapter somewhere before getting HEV suit. There's a little bug with scientist's lab coat animation, making the stool pass through the coat.
